name: Pet Finder
description:
Desperate kids are looking for their pets in your animal shelter. Can you help them find theirs based on their descriptions?

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021 - Slovenia Games.

Authors:

  • CookieMonster
  • Cvetk0
  • diarpite
  • DrYuri

All assets made by the team except for:

  • Casual Cute Avatars made by Kitsuge
